name: SkipTrace
description:
SkipTrace is a runner created for the 2014 Cyberpunk Gamejam. Use a/d or the arrow keys to jump back and forth between the walls. Try to collect the maze³s to increase your multiplier while avoiding the firewalls.

Updates:

Added hard difficulty.

Created by:

Zach Hunter (code) @zhunter3

Jeremy Kuhn (art) @jerkuhn

Jillian Oglre (music) @aylogames

Paul Reinwand (art) @paulreinwand

Some sound effects provided by http://www.freesfx.co.uk
